name: クリア
message: "Isn't this exciting?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "This isn't a game."

name: ミンク
message: "...Let's go."
At Mink's signal, Koujaku throws the door open.
Several men, all in black, are standing in the middle of the room.
Morphine?
They all turn toward us...
...and charge!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Here they come!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Now we're talking! Bring it!"

name: クリア
message: "Waaaaah!"
Koujaku and Mink charge to meet the men in black. Clear and I follow a few steps behind.

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Koujaku!"
Several Beni-Shigure members enter behind us and leap into the fray.

name: 紅雀
message: "Uryah!"
Koujaku's sword never stops swinging. Even as he signals his men with a glance, he keeps knocking down enemies left and right.
Mink, meanwhile, is silent and methodical, felling two or three men with each blow from his massive fists.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hyup! ...Ngh!"
One comes after me, too. I try to dodge his strike, but his elbow catches my chin.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ow... Woah, hey!"
He immediately launches another punch. I block it with my arm, but the punches keep coming.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ugh, don't you have anything better to do?!"
Then I see his face. A chill runs up my spine.
There's something wrong with his eyes.
They're blank. Like a doll's eyes.
And I'm sure I've seen him before, too.
This guy's a member of Dry Juice!
He gets me on the shoulder while I'm distracted. The pain numbs my arm to the fingertips.

name: 蒼葉
message: "That hurt, asshole!"
Acting on reflex, I throw a snap roundhouse kick.
The blow nails him in the stomach. He folds over and crumples to the ground.
These guys attacking us... Are they all Dry Juice?

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Woah!"
Another fist flies at me from the side. I jump back, hoping to gain some breathing room.
...Oh yeah, what happened to Clear?
